articles.title: Oregon reports 10 more COVID-19 deaths, including Jefferson County's 21st - KTVZ
articles.description: COVID-19 has claimed 10 more lives in Oregon, including Jefferson County's 21st death, raising the state’s death toll to 1,613, the Oregon Health Authority reported Monday.
articles.content:

articles.title: First doses administered at Dallas mega COVID vaccine site without major issues - FOX 4 Dallas
articles.description: The mega-site opening is a step in the right direction. More sites are coming online, but the process is slow. And getting the vaccine into the hands of providers is even slower.
articles.content:
DALLAS - The new mega vaccination site at Fair Park in Dallas administered its first doses Monday, reporting only minor issues.
